title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Assistants Mislead in Almost Half of News Responses: EBU-BBC Study
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. title: OpenAI launches AI-powered browser, ChatGPT Atlas
description: OpenAI launched its first AI-powered web browser, ChatGPT Atlas, on Tuesday, positioning the artificial intelligence giant in direct competition with Google’s Chrome.
content:
OpenAI has launched its own artificial intelligence-powered web browser, ChatGPT Atlas, placing the AI giant in direct competition with Google’s Chrome browser, the company announced Tuesday.

title: Microsoft CEO Gets $96 Million Pay Package on ‘Exceptional’ Year
description: Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella’s pay package jumped to $96.5 million for fiscal 2025, his highest compensation since he became CEO more than a decade ago, with the board citing the company’s progress in artificial intelligence.

title: GE Vernova to fully own Prolec JV for $5.28 billion in grid supply push
description: GE Vernova said on Tuesday it would pay $5.28 billion to buy the 50% stake it does not already own in transformer-maker Prolec GE as the artificial intelligence boom fuels grid equipment demand.
content:
The purchase from joint venture partner Xignux would be funded equally between cash and debt and is expected to close by mid-2026, subject to regulatory approvals.

title: My-Blades Launches Tensor 1 - The World’s First AI-Powered Hair Clipper for Professional Barbers
description: My-Blades has unveiled Tensor 1, the world’s first AI-powered professional hair clipper designed for barbers, combining intelligent technology with precision engineering to deliver a personalized haircutting experience that adapts in real time to hair type and style. Learn more at www.myblades.comBerlin , Oct. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- My-Blades, a German manufacturer of premium razor blades and professional barber tools, today announced the launch of Tensor 1, the world’s first professional AI-powered hair clipper designed specifically for barbers. Combining artificial intelligence, precision engineering, and ergonomic design, Tensor 1 delivers a next-generation haircutting experience that adapts in real time to hair type, texture, and cutting style.
